title: Leaverbuster notice
body: I was hit with the Leaver buster after my internet cut out due to lack of payment, I just paid it. How does the leaver buster affect my account because I've been a really good player in following LoL guidelines to the best of my ability. thanks for your time.

replies.body: Leaverbusters won't contribute to any type of suspension or ban if that's what you were worried about!
